description.short:
The base class representing a logger channel.

Users can derive their own logging channels from ofBaseLoggerChannel or use default channels.

message The log message.

##InlineDescription

The base class representing a logger channel.

Users can derive their own logging channels from ofBaseLoggerChannel or use default channels.
